content: brat hat why brat green in the summer of 2024 charli xcx s new album brat was released and featured a garish green cover the color is electric alive and irreverent - perfect for the self-deprecating *it-girl* that embraces cringe as chic when kamala harris announced her run for president charli posted that kamala is brat and brat green was launched into 2024 politics green also represents hope health and life and is a symbol supporting women s reproductive health around the world from argentina to ireland it is a fitting color to revive a show of support for the idea that women s rights are human rights the right of a woman to make her own decisions about her reproductive health and about her body should be hers alone women should have the freedom to make their own choices for themselves and be trusted to make the decision that is best this pattern is based on the pussyhat project by kat coyle knit in the round with choices for yarn weight type of brim and methods of finishing you are *free to choose* the hat style right for you get your crazy cat lady hat on whether you are childless or not and be seen brat hat rev 08-01-2024 page 1 brat hat by tara roberts experience level sizes xs s m l xl xxl approx finished circumference 14 16 18 20 22 24 recommended to be worn with 0-2 of negative ease materials and equipment worsted weight version worsted
